subMembers.name: col
subMembers.description: Specifies which column the element should occupy. Accepts an index from the [cols] array.

subMembers.name: colspan
subMembers.description: Specifies how many columns the element should span.

subMembers.name: location
subMembers.description: Specifies the item location and size against the UI component grid.

subMembers.name: row
subMembers.description: Specifies which row the element should occupy. Accepts an index from the [rows] array.

subMembers.name: rowspan
subMembers.description: Specifies how many rows the element should span.

subMembers.name: screen
subMembers.description: Decides on which screens the current **location** settings should be applied to the element.
